metadata.name: Agaba 001
metadata.description: Our initial pattern collection is named after and designed using the Agaba motif representative of forehead scarification's worn by people that hold the highest 'chieftaincy' title in the community. Bearing the mark was indicative of a person's wealth and attainment of success. The Agaba pattern is abstract, colorful and captures a vibrant essence that manifests in the collections NFTs and product offering.
